author: Ted
content:
Yeah, I know what you mean. I've often thought about building my own website, but.... I don't cut my own hair for a reason.. My time is worth more than the cost of the guy who cuts it really well. I have a guy who does my taxes. Same reason. I want to spend my spare time working on my images and writing, or reading DEEEEEP thoughts ðŸ™‚ And yet if I could find a way to combine my images with my words into illios on a sight that allowed easy grouping and spontaneous access from thumbnails.... Ahhhh... yes... I've often thought about my own website.... Hmmmm....

I am really anxious to see what you come up with. Good luck. It's about time that a prolific and talented photographic visual artist designed one the rest of us can appreciate.
